## The "Luxury Effect" around our parks {.smaller}

::: {layout="[[-1], [1], [-1]]"}
::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggmap)
library(purrr)

parks <- read_sf('full_study_parks.gpkg')

parks <- parks %>% 
  filter(Name == "Frédéric-Back") %>% 
  st_transform(., 3347)

buffer <- st_buffer(parks, 1000) %>% 
  st_transform(., 4326) 


buffer_latlon <- buffer %>% 
  mutate(lat = unlist(map(buffer$geometry,1)),
         long = unlist(map(buffer$geometry,2)))


# API: AIzaSyDlRF5BYeskCH7qWtq13WUV5ifG9Q1kT1c
register_google(key = "AIzaSyDlRF5BYeskCH7qWtq13WUV5ifG9Q1kT1c")
satcol <- qmap(location = "Frederic-Back Park, Montreal, Quebec", zoom = 13, maptype = "satellite", source = "google") 
  #geom_polygon(data = buffer_latlon, aes(x = lat, y = long), fill = NA, colour = "black", linewidth = 1) 

print(satcol)

```
